txt.en: The third page of the ledger talks about the shearing shed and looms. The sheep were shorn several months ago, and several woven blankets should be awaiting you near the looms.
The ledger details out several items around the homestead and their values.

The shearing shed is in the south-west section of the homestead.\n\nThe third page of the ledger says the sheep were shorn several months ago. That means there should be woven blankets near the looms.
